tool_description: An API provides Ontario Go Train Delay information
name: Go Train Delay
title: Go Train Delay

api_list.name: Get All Delays
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com/delays/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com/delays/{page_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-train-delay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
